html: To the sword—A great number of you shall perish by the sword; or possibly the term number may refer to all in the next phrase, so that none of them should escape. God saith he will number them, tell them out one by one to the sword. Bow down—As you have bowed down to idols. I called—By my prophets, you did not answer by doing the things which I enjoined. Chuse—You sinned deliberately chusing sinful courses, the things which I hated.
